column2: "Devil Castles in Verun... They've spread all over the world, just as Luther said."
"Hey, Sina, who the hell are these guys?"
"Hey, that's harsh. We came rushing here to save you, a little appreciation would be nice!"
"Hmph... I never asked for your help."
"Gettemhart! I'm sorry, he's always like this..."
"This nation, Verun... What's going on here?"
"Isn't it obvious? It's war."
"War... against which nation?"
"Not a nation. Against everything around us."
"The weak die, the strong prevail. That is the way of things in Verun."
"If you want to understand the situation... Just follow me."
"This is... a village?"
"This is no village. This is where the survivors gather."
"Hey, Gettemhart! Thanks for before!"
"Hmph, you just stood there like a frightened sheep. Now you're another mouth to feed."
"Hahaha! Never at a loss for words, are you?"
"As you just heard, we might have to dip into tomorrow's food supply. It's like this everywhere in Verun."
"Hey, Gettemhart, you're still alive?"
"Eh? Oh, hey kiddo. What's the matter, can't you say \"thanks for protecting me\"?"
"Huh, I don't remember asking you to protect me!"
"Hehe, reminds me of a certain someone."
"Hey, don't glare at me! It's true!"
"Melphonsina... Where's my daddy? He left with everyone to protect the village, where is he?"
"Your father's gone away, somewhere a long way from here, to protect everyone."
"It's ok, Melphonsina. I understand. Daddy won't be coming home."
"I'm sorry."
"Hey, don't cry! It's the same for me! Just you wait, when I grow up I'll be big and strong and I'll defeat the Emperor!"
"But what if the Emperor kills you... I don't want that..."
"I won't lose! You can bet on that! I'm gonna beat that dumb old Emperor!"
"Hahaha... Don't make me laugh, kiddo. I'll be the one that crushes that damned Emperor."
"You just focus on staying alive. Now go on, get out of here."
"Gettemhart and I are forever indebted to this village."
"We want to protect this place, but against the Devil Castles, it's a never-ending struggle... We've sacrificed a lot."
"With the nearby Devil Castle destroyed, we should be ok for now..."
"But soon, the struggle will begin again. The only way to end it is to destroy the Emperor."
"The Devil Castles, the Demonic Soldiers... I'll destroy them all, and the Emperor too... I'll put an end to this damned country."
"He's not very honest with himself, and I know he's gruff and hard to understand, but... He wants to bring peace to this land."
"It's a civil war, is that correct? Has anyone thought of overthrowing the Emperor before?"
"Yes, of course. And the Emperor's power has overwhelmed all of them."
"The Emperor is stronger than anyone. His only desire is to fight a strong opponent. Nothing else matters."
"Be it people's struggle for survival, or the perishing nation... Nothing matters to him."
"All he does is fight? But why would he do something so meaningless..."
"1. This Emperor is a tyrant."
"2. We can't let this stand."
"Yes, this is terrible. We have to stop this, whether he's being controlled or not."
"You're right to be angry. It's too awful... we have to do something."
"And don't forget, there's Ephimera here as well... It's clear that Darker influence is at work here."
"Destroying Darkers is ARKS' mission. We have to deal with this now."

"Meanwhile, at the capital of the Verunian Empire.
Schlegger, the Emperor of Verun, and his brother Elmir,
listened quietly to the report regarding the status of the Devil Castle..."
"Seems like they're here, brother. The ones who defeated the Devil Castle."
"Spreading those rumors was the right move after all. I expect the people will liven up soon enough, now that they have a nice, simple banner to rally behind."
"Pitting our Demonic Soldiers against Devil Castles has lost its lustre of late. I do hope that our new guests will entertain."
"And how strong are they... Especially this \"Guardian\"?"
"You can't, brother, not yet! If you devoured them now, you'd spoil it!"
"You have to let them swim a little longer, or else the meal will have no flavour."
"Heh... Giving orders to the Emperor now? Look how high and mighty you've become."
"Very well then. Do as you wish."
"Well then, if you'll excuse me, I have an introduction to prepare."
"Guardian... How strong are you, how much power... I cannot contain my anticipation for the future pleasures that await me."
"Spread the war as you see fit. This nation, the people, Ephimera... Everything in the world will be our sacrifice."
"The Destruction and Struggle"
"A Nation in Ruins"
"Ex-Scared Man"
"Strong-Willed Boy"
"Sad Girl"
